name: FROSINN: Guardian of winter
description:
You are the gloomy warrior that serve the WINTER QUEEN.

You like silence and live alone, but suddenly noisy spring faries are coming!

How to play:

-use left mouse to hack and slash faries back to nature.

-right mouse use for special attack (guage must max)

This game is a part of Jamdna#10

Criterion #1: Hack and slash
Gameplay that emphasizes combat.

Hack and slash the faries.

Criterion # 2: Nature

Theme and background is from winter season to spring season.

Criterion #3: Inertia
The tendency of a body in straight line motion to stay in motion in a straight line unless acted on by an outside force.

Inertia on ice!

Criterion #4: Fanfare Music
Short musical flourish that is typically played by trumpets or other brass instruments.

Fanfare Music are come with faries,The are noisy!!!
